summary: After a string of bad luck, a debt collector has no other choice than to spend the night in a haunted temple, where he encounters a ravishing female ghost and later battles to save her soul from the control of a wicked tree demon.
cast: Leslie Cheung|Joey Wang|Wu Ma|Wai Lam|Siu-Ming Lau|Zhilun Xue|Jing Wong|David Wu|Ha Huang|Yau Cheung Yeung|Mei-Yee Sze|Kam Cheung
title: Una historia china de fantasmas
